EmailTemplate.name: TSE: VMworld 2018.001 VMworld 2018 - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Will you join us at VMworld?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, I would like to offer you an exclusive invitation to a 30-minute meeting with members of our executive team at VMworld in Las Vegas (August 26th – 30th, 2018).
Many of the world’s most influential corporations, including over 100 of the Fortune 500, have turned to Turbonomic to navigate their Digital Transformation journeys. Our AI-driven workload automation platform spans on-premises virtualized data centers, public clouds and emerging container environments to assure application performance, enforce business policies, and drive dramatic cost efficiencies.
I would be delighted to schedule time with our executives onsite so you can learn more. Simply let me know by requesting a meeting here <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-meeting-vmworld-2018/]]>.
We hope to see you there!
Regards, Kristen
